revised_title: Mass Transfer in Laminar Streams to Flat Plates
tldr: The authors use the Karman-Pohlhausen-Kroujiline method to calculate the mass-transfer rate from a laminar stream to a flat plate, focusing on high rates of mass transfer when the transfer number approaches zero. They also discuss the velocity and concentration profiles and their relationship to the mass-transfer rate. This research has implications for understanding processes like condensation and combustion.
